Class: viewMixin

This mixin is the widget's view.

This mixin is the widget's view.

addEventCalendar(calendarTab)

Add a new fullcalendar eventSource

Parameters:
  • array calendarTab

    eventSource as an array formated for fullCalendar
view source

didInsertElement()

Create the fullcalendar at the beginning and catch every changed view

view source

eventClick(calEvent, jsEvent)

Describes actions to do when a user click is handled on an event

Parameters:
  • object calEvent

    Event catched by the click
  • object jsEvent

    Javascript event catched by the click
view source

getCalendarWidth()

Synchronize selected calendar width to the widget

view source

goToDate(date)

call the fullcalendar gotoDate method with the given date

Parameters:
  • number date

    timestamp which represents the date to switch on
view source

removeEventCalendar(calendarTab)

remove a old fullcalendar eventSource

Parameters:
  • array calendarTab

    eventSource as an array formated for fullCalendar
view source

removeUserEvent()

Remove only one selected event from the fullcalendar, getting it from the controller

view source

select(start, end)

Let the user to create an event by selecting a time range on the calendar

Parameters:
  • date start

    started date given by the selection
  • date end

    ended date given by the selection
view source

viewRender(month, calendar)

Refresh each source event after

Parameters:
  • CalendarView month

    current view to refresh
  • calendar calendar

    the concerned calendar element
view source

willDestroyElement()

Disable all triggered actions and destroy all view's objects
